com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model

Class Auditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.Auditor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RuleBookAuditor, RuleBookRunner

    public abstract class Auditor
extends java.lang.Object
    Auditors are used for auditing rules. They maintain a record of each Rule and their state.
